3:
Great is Yahweh and greatly to be praised;
\q his greatness is unsearchable.
4:
One generation will praise your deeds to the next
\q and will proclaim your mighty actions.
\q
5:
I will meditate on the majesty of your glory
\q and on your marvelous deeds.
6:
They will speak of the power of your awesome works,
\q and I will declare your greatness.
\q
7:
They will declare your abounding goodness,
\q and they will sing about your righteousness.
8:
Yahweh is gracious and merciful,
\q slow to anger and abounding in covenant faithfulness.
\q
9:
Yahweh is good to all;
\q his tender mercies are over all his works.
11:
Your faithful ones will speak of the glory of your kingdom,
\q and they will tell of your power.
\q
12:
They will make known to mankind God's mighty deeds
\q and the glorious splendor of his kingdom.
13:
Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom,
\q and your dominion endures throughout all generations.
14:
Yahweh supports all who are falling
\q and raises up all those who are bent over.
\q
16:
You open your hand
\q and satisfy the desire of every living thing.
17:
Yahweh is righteous in all his ways
\q and gracious in all he does.
\q
18:
Yahweh is near to all those who call to him,
\q to all who call to him in trustworthiness.
\q
19:
He fulfills the desire of those who honor him;
\q he hears their cry and saves them.
20:
Yahweh watches over all those who love him,
\q but he will destroy all the wicked.
\q
21:
My mouth will speak out the praise of Yahweh;
\q let all mankind bless his holy name forever and ever.
145:
\m
\d A psalm of praise. Of David.
\q
